parameters.name: BackendEnvironmentName
parameters.description: The name of the backend environment.

nested_items.name: AppId
nested_items.description: The app ID.

nested_items.name: BackendEnvironmentName
nested_items.description: The name of the backend environment.

nested_items.name: Error
nested_items.description: If the request fails, this error is returned.

nested_items.name: ResourceConfig
nested_items.description: The resource configuration for authorization requests to the backend of your Amplify project.

nested_items.name: AuthResources
nested_items.description: Defines whether you want to configure only authentication or both authentication and authorization settings.

nested_items.name: IdentityPoolConfigs
nested_items.description: Describes the authorization configuration for the Amazon Cognito identity pool, provisioned as a part of your auth resource in the Amplify project.

nested_items.name: IdentityPoolName
nested_items.description: Name of the Amazon Cognito identity pool used for authorization.

nested_items.name: UnauthenticatedLogin
nested_items.description: Set to true or false based on whether you want to enable guest authorization to your Amplify app.

nested_items.name: Service
nested_items.description: Defines the service name to use when configuring an authentication resource in your Amplify project.

nested_items.name: UserPoolConfigs
nested_items.description: Describes authentication configuration for the Amazon Cognito user pool, provisioned as a part of your auth resource in the Amplify project.

nested_items.name: ForgotPassword
nested_items.description: (DEPRECATED) Describes the forgotten password policy for your Amazon Cognito user pool, configured as a part of your Amplify project.

nested_items.name: DeliveryMethod
nested_items.description: (DEPRECATED) Describes which mode to use (either SMS or email) to deliver messages to app users who want to recover their password.

nested_items.name: EmailSettings
nested_items.description: (DEPRECATED) The configuration for the email sent when an app user forgets their password.

nested_items.name: EmailMessage
nested_items.description: The contents of the email message.

nested_items.name: EmailSubject
nested_items.description: The contents of the subject line of the email message.

nested_items.name: SmsSettings
nested_items.description: (DEPRECATED) The configuration for the SMS message sent when an app user forgets their password.

nested_items.name: SmsMessage
nested_items.description: The contents of the SMS message.

nested_items.name: MFAMode
nested_items.description: Describes whether MFA should be [ON, OFF, or OPTIONAL] for authentication in your Amplify project.

nested_items.name: MfaTypes
nested_items.description: The supported MFA types.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: SmsMessage
nested_items.description: The body of the SMS message.

nested_items.name: DomainPrefix
nested_items.description: The domain prefix for your Amplify app.

nested_items.name: OAuthGrantType
nested_items.description: The OAuth grant type that you use to allow app users to authenticate from your Amplify app.

nested_items.name: OAuthScopes
nested_items.description: List of OAuth-related flows used to allow your app users to authenticate from your Amplify app.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: RedirectSignInURIs
nested_items.description: The redirected URI for signing in to your Amplify app.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: RedirectSignOutURIs
nested_items.description: Redirect URLs that OAuth uses when a user signs out of an Amplify app.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: SocialProviderSettings
nested_items.description: The settings for using social providers to access your Amplify app.

nested_items.name: ClientId
nested_items.description: Describes the client_id, which can be obtained from the third-party social federation provider.

nested_items.name: ClientSecret
nested_items.description: Describes the client_secret, which can be obtained from third-party social federation providers.

nested_items.name: ClientId
nested_items.description: Describes the client_id, which can be obtained from the third-party social federation provider.

nested_items.name: ClientSecret
nested_items.description: Describes the client_secret, which can be obtained from third-party social federation providers.

nested_items.name: LoginWithAmazon
nested_items.description: Describes third-party social federation configurations for allowing your app users to sign in using OAuth.

nested_items.name: ClientId
nested_items.description: Describes the client_id, which can be obtained from the third-party social federation provider.

nested_items.name: ClientSecret
nested_items.description: Describes the client_secret, which can be obtained from third-party social federation providers.

nested_items.name: SignInWithApple
nested_items.description: Describes Apple social federation configurations for allowing your app users to sign in using OAuth.

nested_items.name: ClientId
nested_items.description: Describes the client_id (also called Services ID) that comes from Apple.

nested_items.name: KeyId
nested_items.description: Describes the key_id that comes from Apple.

nested_items.name: PrivateKey
nested_items.description: Describes the private_key that comes from Apple.

nested_items.name: TeamId
nested_items.description: Describes the team_id that comes from Apple.

nested_items.name: PasswordPolicy
nested_items.description: Describes the password policy for your Amazon Cognito user pool, configured as a part of your Amplify project.

nested_items.name: AdditionalConstraints
nested_items.description: Additional constraints for the password used to access the backend of your Amplify project.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: MinimumLength
nested_items.description: The minimum length of the password used to access the backend of your Amplify project.

nested_items.name: RequiredSignUpAttributes
nested_items.description: The required attributes to sign up new users in the user pool.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: SignInMethod
nested_items.description: Describes the sign-in methods that your Amplify app users use to log in using the Amazon Cognito user pool, configured as a part of your Amplify project.

nested_items.name: UserPoolName
nested_items.description: The Amazon Cognito user pool name.

nested_items.name: VerificationMessage
nested_items.description: Describes the email or SMS verification message for your Amazon Cognito user pool, configured as a part of your Amplify project.

nested_items.name: DeliveryMethod
nested_items.description: The type of verification message to send.

nested_items.name: EmailSettings
nested_items.description: The settings for the email message.

nested_items.name: EmailMessage
nested_items.description: The contents of the email message.

nested_items.name: EmailSubject
nested_items.description: The contents of the subject line of the email message.

nested_items.name: SmsSettings
nested_items.description: The settings for the SMS message.

nested_items.name: SmsMessage
nested_items.description: The contents of the SMS message.

nested_items.name: ResourceName
nested_items.description: The name of this resource.
